name: Goblin Jumper - Smart TV Game
description:
Goblin Jumper is a simple but challenging casual endless jumper mobile and smart tv game.

The goal of the game is to jump through as many platforms and enemies as possible.

Features:
- Responsive controls
- Endless jumping
- Various characters to play with
- Play with Smart TV Remote Control
- Smooth Control, No gamepad required

Official Website: https://www.smarttvboxgames.com/

Compatible Smart TV Boxes:

This game can be played on: Pendoo T95, Xiaomi Mi Box S, Chromecast, Beelink GT King Pro, NVIDIA SHIELD Android TV Pro, Q Plus Android Box, Roku Ultra
